01842         if(word.Right(3) == _T("ied")){
01843                 return word.Left(word.Len()-3)+_T("y");
01844         }
01845 
01846         // Check for Last ies
01847         if(word.Right(3) == _T("ies")){
01848                 return word.Left(word.Len()-3)+_T("y");
01849         }
01850 
01851         // Check for Last ying
01852         if(word.Right(4) == _T("ying")){
01853                 return word.Left(word.Len()-3);
01854         }
01855 
01856         // Check for Last ning
01857         if(word.Right(4) == _T("ning") && (wordList.Index(word,false) == wxNOT_FOUND)){
01858                 if(wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-4),false) != wxNOT_FOUND){
01859                         return word.Left(word.Len()-4);
01860                 }
01861         }
01862 
01863         // Check for Last ment
01864         if(word.Right(4) == _T("ment") && (wordList.Index(word,false) == wxNOT_FOUND)){
01865                 if(wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-4),false) != wxNOT_FOUND){
01866                         return word.Left(word.Len()-4);
01867                 }
01868         }
01869 
01870         // Check for Last ing
01871         if(word.Right(3) == _T("ing") && (wordList.Index(word,false) == wxNOT_FOUND)){
01872                 if(wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-3)+_T("e"),false) != wxNOT_FOUND){
01873                         return word.Left(word.Len()-3)+_T("e");
01874                 }else{
01875                         return word.Left(word.Len()-3);
01876                 }
01877         }
01878 
01879         // Check for Last s
01880         if(word.Right(1) == _T("s") && (wordList.Index(word,false) == wxNOT_FOUND) && (wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-1),false) != wxNOT_FOUND)){
01881                 return word.Left(word.Len()-1);
01882         }
01883 
01884         // Check for Last ly
01885         if(word.Right(2) == _T("ly") && (wordList.Index(word,false) == wxNOT_FOUND) && (wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-2),false) != wxNOT_FOUND)){
01886                 return word.Left(word.Len()-2);
01887         }
01888 
01889         // Check for Last ed
01890         if(word.Right(2) == _T("ed")){
01891                 if(wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-2),false) != wxNOT_FOUND){
01892                         return word.Left(word.Len()-2);
01893                 }else{
01894                         return word.Left(word.Len()-1);
01895                 }
01896         }
01897 
01898         // Check for Last es
01899         if(word.Right(2) == _T("es") && (wordList.Index(word,false) == wxNOT_FOUND) && (wordList.Index(word.Left(word.Len()-2),false) != wxNOT_FOUND)){
01900                 return word.Left(word.Len()-2);         
01901         }
01902 
01903         return word;

00939         wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00940         scanner_last = scanner_now.MakeLower();
00941         scanner_now = pConfig->Read(_T("/Options/Temp-String"), _T(""));
00942 
00943         scanner_now.MakeLower();
00944         scanner_now.Trim(TRUE);
00945         scanner_now.Trim(FALSE);
00946 
00947         scanner_now = ProcessWord(scanner_now);
00948     }   
00949    
00950     //DEBUGGING
00951     //fprintf(stderr, "Checking Scanner-Now:%s\n", (const char *)scanner_now.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
00952     //fprintf(stderr, "Checking Scanner-Last:%s\n", (const char *)scanner_last.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));             
00953 
00954     if(watcher){
00955             if(watcher_now.Len() > 0){
00956                 if(!watcher_now.IsSameAs(watcher_last, TRUE) && !watcher_now.IsSameAs(scanner_last, TRUE) && CheckSpell(watcher_now,0) && watcher_now.IsAscii() && watcher_now.IsWord()){           
00957                     m_text->SetValue(watcher_now);
00958                     if(translate(watcher_now)){             
00959                             this->Raise();
00960                             this->SetFocus();
00961                     }
00962                 }
00963             }
00964     }
00965 
00966     if(scanner){
00967             if(scanner_now.Len() > 0 && scanner_now != m_text->GetValue()){
00968                 if(!scanner_now.IsSameAs(scanner_last, TRUE) && !scanner_now.IsSameAs(watcher_last, TRUE) && CheckSpell(scanner_now,0) && scanner_now.IsAscii() && scanner_now.IsWord()){           
00969                     m_text->SetValue(scanner_now);
00970                     translate(scanner_now,false,true);                      
00971                 }
00972             }
00973     }
00974 }
